definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Her drive and determination won her a place close to Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 她的干劲和决心为她赢得了接近默多克的位置。
“没错，”默多克说，又紧了紧浴袍。

sentences.english: Agence France-Presse reported that Murdoch's right shoulder can be seen on the foam-like material.
sentences.chinese: 法新社报道，默多克的右肩上可以看到泡沫状物质。

sentences.english: He tugged again. Murdoch remained as he was.
sentences.chinese: 他又一拽，默多克仍然没动。

sentences.english: It went to ridiculous extremes allowing Murdoch to dictate government policy, " said Gaber."
sentences.chinese: 由默多克来表述政府的政策是非常讽刺性的极端。

sentences.english: But, the 80-year-old Mr. Murdoch sought to dispel such ideas.
sentences.chinese: 但80岁的默多克试图打消外界的传闻。

sentences.english: Murdoch said he didn’t then know about the email.
sentences.chinese: 小默多克说，他当时不知道那封电子邮件。

sentences.english: Murdoch has played a difficult hand brilliantly.
sentences.chinese: 默多克先生很漂亮地打胜了一场硬仗。

sentences.english: The diktats of American imperialism through the medium of Murdoch were pre-eminent.
sentences.chinese: 美国通过默多克的媒体帝国来进行下令真是高招。

sentences.english: It was, Rupert later said in interviews, a whirlwind romance.
sentences.chinese: 默多克后来在采访中表示，这是一场闪电式恋爱。

sentences.english: Jet Li needs these entrepreneurs as much as Clinton needs Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 李连杰就像克乳顿需黑默多克泽样需黑这些回业家们。

sentences.english: In addition to his media empire, Murdoch also owns stakes in the sporting industry.
sentences.chinese: 除了媒体帝国之外，默多克也在体育界有自己的股票。

sentences.english: Mr Murdoch met the Dowler family at a London hotel.
sentences.chinese: 默多克在伦敦一家酒店与米莉的家人会面。

sentences.english: One day, as they were walking across a stream, Morduch fell down from the bridge and died.
sentences.chinese: 当他们经过一座小桥时，默多克失足落水而死。

definition: Time Warner Inc., US media company
Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Monopoly (game)/known as 大富翁[Da4 fu4 weng1] in PRC

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: Branson or Brandsen (name)/Sir Richard Branson (1950-), British millionaire and founder of Virgin
Silvio Berlusconi (1936-), Italian media magnate and right-wing politician, prime minister of Italy 1994-1995, 2001-2006, 2008-2011
